name: results
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool msport.
Tool description: Soccer livescore , results , fixtures , match and everything you need from 7msport 

(if you need additional or new feature just contact me)
API description: Msport  Soccer results at date - a comprehensive soccer match archive

date.description: The date of the soccer matches to retrieve results for (format: 'YYYY-MM-DD').

page.description: The page number of results to retrieve. Defaults to 1.
